subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Hunter Mahan and the 2010 winner Ian Poulter set up a showdown at the W.G.C.-Accenture Match Play Championship by winning their quarterfinals.
snippet: The defending champion Hunter Mahan and the 2010 winner Ian Poulter set up a showdown at the W.G.C.-Accenture Match Play Championship by winning their quarterfinals.
